DataElement.preferredName: Image Positive Left Breast Lesion Finding Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The quantity of lesions found in a positive observation in the right breast.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An observation confirming a positive clincial finding in the right breast.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:An observation confirming something, such as the
presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Property.preferredDefinition: The hemispheric projection, including the mammary gland, located on the anterior portion of the chest, lateral to the midline, on the side of the body to the west when facing north.

Concepts.definition: The hemispheric projection, including the mammary gland, located on the anterior portion of the chest, lateral to the midline, on the side of the body to the west when facing north.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor. 3/21/07 jc  Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task; 3/25/07 jc updated for EVS term recommendation.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of lesions found in a positive finding.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:Involving advantage or good.:The result of an examination or inquiry.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
The result of an examination or inquiry.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/11/13 removed caBIG ACRIN CSI. jc  10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor; added positive as qualifer.  3/20/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Number of solid findings/lesi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of solid findings/lesions other than simple cysts: Left Breast

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/14/13 Removed caBIG-ACRIN Breast Ultrasound CSI; added equivalent modality and Under Review ECOG-ACRIN CSI. jc   10/31/12 Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor jc.  3/26/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.
